about_the_game:
DLC-exclusive items that allow you to change the Sandras's appearance. Contains 6 different item designs.

Mana User's Sail: Fire
Mana User's Sail: Ice
Pirate Ship's Sail
Mana User's Hull: Fire
Mana User's Hull: Ice
Pirate Ship's Hull

*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After receiving items, modify your ship via [Equipment] -> [Decorations] in the main menu.
